intro: Let's learn about space in a fun way with a quiz that rotates images! By comparing photos, you can get to know the universe even better!
description:
Simply arrange the images in the correct order for various space rankings and press the OK button!
This educational puzzle game allows you to relax with mesmerizing space images while also gaining cool trivia knowledge that makes you look smart.

How to Play is Simple:
・Read the question carefully.
・Slide the panels to arrange the three images in the correct order.
・If you get it right, you can read an explanation.

★ Arrange the planets in order of the fewest to most moons!
☆ Arrange the order of successful moon landings!
★ Arrange the components of the Earth in order of abundance!
And more!

Why not challenge yourself with brain-training quizzes on various space-related topics, from planets and constellations to historical events?
If you clear them all, you might just become a space expert starting today!

The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
